ReviewList.Text: Like Dante's Inferno, King paints a vision of the afterlife that is so frightening it will definitely keep me up at night. In addition to being terrifying and loaded with vivid imagery, this book was just as well-written as it was addictive. Seriously, once I started this book I couldn't put it down until I finished it. Overall, this is an amazing book and I definitely look forward to reading more by this author in the future.

A great read for those who can tend to forget just how horrible hell is. This will keep the vision of it in the back of your mind on a daily basis, and help you be conscious of your actions. It's a short story of a man's journey to hell and back, that is so terrifying, you will never want to go. I found this to be both an entertaining read, but it also had a positive influence on my day to day life. Great read!

It was very fast reading. It was a very accurate account to me of what Hell is about. A truthfull warning to unbelievers of the true faith of Jesus Christ. Your Soul has an eternal destination. If you are not "Born Again" your final destination is Hell. A Place of eternal torment and a place where God is not present.
I don't know if this is "book worthy." I think a better format of this may have been a blog, video post or letter of some sort.
This was probably the worst and most poorly written book I have ever read!
I guess I kind of expected more. It was a pretty short book.

I wasn't sure what to think when I saw this listed under fiction. I've read other experiences of hell that were not listed as fiction. As a Christian I find any description of hell to be terrifying since I know it's a real place. It gives an interesting perspective that is truly frightening.

Wow, this book is very enlightening and intriguing. The distinctive choice of words and message behind them had me stimulated. It proclaims a man experience in hell and boy, was it interesting and vivid. Surely, my time in this book was well spent. Thumbs up!
I enjoyed reading this book, I just wish it was a longer read.
OK this story had a very interesting side to it in comparison  to other ones of this topic. I found it a very good eye opening read.
